DoingBusinessAsName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: WILLIAM E SCRIPPS ESTATE ICON DEI GUILD

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE THE INFORMATION, EDUCATION, TREATMENT AND CARE NEEDED TO ASSURE THAT CATHOLIC PRIESTS, DEACONS, MEN AND WOMEN RELIGIOUS, AND SEMINARIANS SUFFERING FROM ALCOHOLISM AND OTHER SPECIFIED ADDICTIONS HAVE THE BEST OPPORTUNITY FOR QUALITY RECOVERY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE THE INFORMATION, EDUCATION, TREATMENT AND CARE NEEDED TO ASSURE THAT CATHOLIC CLERGY, MEN AND WOMEN RELIGIOUS, AND SEMINARIANS SUFFERING FROM ALCOHOLISM, ADDICTIONS AND OTHER BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CONDITIONS HAVE THE BEST OPPORTUNITY FOR QUALITY RECOVERY AND OVERALL HEALTH AND WELLNESS.
IRS990.Desc: PATIENT CARE - PROVIDE INPATIENT PRIMARY CARE AND AFTER CARE FOR APPROXIMATELY 198 ROMAN CATHOLIC, MALE AND FEMALE, CLERGY AND RELIGIOUS SUFFERING FROM CHEMICAL DEPENDENCY, PRIMARILY ALCOHOLISM.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION FOR OTHER INCOME

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS, WHICH IS LIMITED TO THE EARNINGS ON THE ASSETS, IS FOR OPERATIONAL NEEDS.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES NOT INCLUDED IN PART X 87,562. OTHER CHANGES IN BENEFIT PLAN ASSETS AND OBLIGATIONS 1,081,271.
DIRECT FUNDRAISING EXPENSES INCLUDED IN PART IX 87,562.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: SOUTH ASIA - AFGHANISTAN, BANGLADESH, BHUTAN, INDIA, MALDIVES, NEPAL,

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENTITY THAT GUEST HOUSE SUBSIDIZES AND ISSUES GRANTS TO WILL SUBMIT A MONTHLY REPORT OF CASH NEEDS, THEN THE REPORT IS APPROVED BY THE PRESIDENT AND COO, AND ACCOUNTING PROCESSES THE DISBURSEMENT AND MAINTAINS THE RECORDS.
ROBERT KOVALS RECEIVED SEVERANCE PAYMENTS TOTALING $165,878 DURING THE TAX YEAR. PAYMENT WAS MADE PER SIGNED EMPLOYEE CONTRACT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRESIDENT & COO, VICE PRESIDENT & CFO, AND ACCOUNTING SUPERVISOR REVIEW AND APPROVE THE FORM 990 RETURN. THEN THE RETURN IS PROVIDED TO MEMBERS OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WHO REVIEW AND APPROVE THE RETURN PRIOR TO FILING. A COPY OF THE RETURN IS ALSO PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DISTRIBUTED TO MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ANNUALLY DURING THE MAY BOARD MEETING. THE BOARD MEMBERS SIGN AND DATE A COPY OF THE POLICY DOCUMENT WHICH IS TRACKED AND MAINTAINED BY THE ADMINISTRATION DEPARTMENT. THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES IS RESPONSIBLE FOR MONITORING MEMBERS AND ENFORCING COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. AFTER EXERCISING DUE DILIGENCE, THE BOARD CHAIR, DISINTERESTED PERSON, OR GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE WILL DETERMINE WHETHER THE ORGANIZATION CAN OBTAIN SIMILAR OR MORE ADVANTAGEOUS RESULTS WITH REASONABLE EFFORTS UNDER CIRCUMSTANCES THAT WOULD NOT GIVE RISE TO A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. IF THE ORGANIZATION IS DETERMINED NOT TO BE HARMED IN THE RELATIONSHIP, THEN THE RELATIONSHIP MAY CONTINUE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN OUTSIDE COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS ORGANIZATION CONDUCTS A COMPREHENSIVE STUDY TO SOLICIT AND PROVIDE APPROPRIATE DATA RELATED TO THE COMPENSATION OF ALL EXECUTIVES IN THE ORGANIZATION. THIS INFORMATION IS PROVIDED TO THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, AND UTILIZED IN THE DETERMINATION OF SALARIES AND TOTAL COMPENSATION OF EACH EXECUTIVE. THE DETERMINATION OF THE DECISION IS RECORDED IN THE MINUTES OF THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE. THIS PROCESS LAST OCCURRED IN 2015. ANNUAL INCREASES ARE DETERMINED AND DOCUMENTED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ORGANIZATIONAL DOCUMENTS, AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
OTHER CHANGES IN BENEFIT PLAN ASSETS AND OBLIGATIONS 1,081,271.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
